'''Copper nuggets''' are minimum pieces of copper that can be obtained by [[smelting]] copper [[tool]]s, [[weapon]]s and [[armor]], or [[crafting]] it with a [[copper ingot]]. One copper nugget is effectively worth one-ninth of a [[copper ingot]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting|Copper Ingot
|Output = Copper Nugget,9
|type = Material
|foot = 1
}}
=== Smelting ===
{{Smelting
|Copper Sword; Copper Spear; Any copper tools; Any copper armor; Copper Horse Armor; Copper Nautilus Armor
|Copper Nugget
}}
[[Durability]] and [[Enchanting|enchantment]]s do not affect the ability to smelt copper tools, weapons, or armor into copper nuggets.
